channel.title: Playing problem...-Client shuts down after two clicks
channel.description:
ok sooo here's my problem.. I'm playing on a server and I can't click more than once without the client shutting down... It gives me this error.
[code] # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d841d76, pid=5776, tid=3564 # # JRE version: 6.0_15-b03 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.1-b02 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x51d76] # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp #

item.title: Playing problem...-Client shuts down after two clicks
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

yep your on vista… i got same shit… use azn client. (mods don’t shoot me)

):

azn client is only thing that works.
for “us” people who have that problem

Read full topic
